description:
Years after the War of Heroes, Ashram seeks the Scepter of Domination—one of four treasures protected by legendary dragons. Meanwhile, a woman and a berserker start trouble in a village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiyuu Kishi... Aratanaru Rekishi no Hajimari
The Free Knight... A New Legend Begins
自由騎士... 新たなる歴史の始まり
